g.text: Keypad: 9 LCD buttons (80x80px), 15 pages | Dial: precision rotary encoder
Actions Ring: 8 contextual bubbles | Haptic motor: 15 waveforms | Per-app profiles
(This is what we build -- Logitech Actions SDK, C#)
AI suggests button mappings for you
AI reasons about what to do, not just run
Adjusts based on what you use
(Each button maps to any action you want)
(Ship with plugin -- one-click setup via wizard)
Full-stack AI agent (file, bash, web, git)
Thinking depth dial: Flash to Marathon
PRESET: Code Flow + DevOps + Agent Control
Code editing (read, edit, write, glob, grep)
Map any button to any action
AI suggests layout from your project
Dial maps to any continuous value
CLI wizard -- AI-guided, interactive, takes ~30 seconds
Gemini API key or Wispy cloud
AI scans project (git, npm, docker, CI)
AI proposes button layout for you
Accept, modify, or build from scratch

svg.text: WISPY CONSOLE // AI-POWERED DEVELOPER CONTROL SURFACE // LOGITECH ACTIONS SDK // HAUSOR LABS 2026
